pageContext.description: Dimensions: max. dim. 74.3mm; max Y 29.5mm; Wt. 431.9 g,Typology: both faces undulating, with a few deep-pits; one face more convex than other; parts of original convex edge flattish.,Manufacture: few portions of cylindrical raids in main breaks,Condition: breaks partly dirty - edges rounded, appearing worn; one break with light score marks, gold flecked - modern damage,Attached: light yellow - brown soil over much of surface
pageContext.surface: Limited area on original edge retains patina - dark grey-green or this just extends onto underface of ingot; rest varied light greens, dry surface, in part dusty; parts of edge rubbed to dark brown more metallic surface.
pageContext.collection: Parkinson, Mr. L. - private (1982),14 Tomarsh Square, E. Acton, London WI2
pageContext.toSearch: Quarry Wood, Windsor And Maidenhead, UK
pageContext.remarks: PIF; DF(S): SI; RSO 12.6.81; CI; SN Jan. 82; Sb.A.; Sub. Inf. 12/6/81
